thread.title: Caitlyn Jenner Tweets About Her Mother's Scary Injury
thread.title_full: Caitlyn Jenner Tweets About Her Mother's Scary Injury

author: Cosmopolitan.com
title: Caitlyn Jenner Tweets About Her Mother's Scary Injury
text:
​Caitlyn Jenner revealed her mother Esther recently injured herself—but don't worry! Caitlyn said her mom is doing fine after the incident.
Visiting my mom and she's doing great after breaking both her hips. She's been mobile - she's tough. pic.twitter.com/VcQoPpI7XC
— Caitlyn Jenner (@Caitlyn_Jenner) October 12, 2015
 Esther has been a supportive fixture during Caityln's high-profile transition; she was often seen on the reality show ​I Am Cait. ​ "Visiting my mom and she's doing great after breaking both her hips," Caitlyn tweeted. "She's been mobile—she's tough."
In the photo Caitlyn shared Esther, 89, sits and smiles while her doting daughter stands behind her. Hip injuries like that are no laughing matter , so it's good to know that she's doing well. Get better soon, Esther!
Follow Rebecca on Instagram .
 ​
